scripts.dev: npm run build && wrangler dev dist/worker.js
scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler deploy dist/worker.js
scripts.preview: npm run build && node -e "console.log('\nüìã Build completed. Preview URLs:'); const urls = require('./urls.json'); Object.entries(urls).slice(0, 5).forEach(([k,v]) => console.log('  /' + k + ' ‚Üí ' + v));"
scripts.validate: node -e "try { const urls = require('./urls.json'); console.log('‚úÖ urls.json is valid -', Object.keys(urls).length, 'URLs found'); } catch(e) { console.error('‚ùå urls.json is invalid:', e.message); process.exit(1); }"
